item.title: Passwordless
item.description: Implementing passwordless In Phase 1?: “Yes, since it’s a new doc pulling from existing content” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Links to original docs: - Best practices for password optional: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/pwd-optional-best-practices/nodeexpress/main/ Content type: How-to Goal-oriented. Shows how to achieve a specific goal (or solve a specific problem).
